KuaiLive

A real-world dataset for live streaming recommendation

Data Descriptions:

File organization:

  KuaiLive
  ├── author.csv          
  ├── click.csv
  ├── comment.csv
  ├── gift.csv
  ├── like.csv
  ├── mapped_room.csv
  ├── title_embeddings_pca128.npy
  └── user.csv
